amendment.description: Amendment prohibits any funds in the bill from being used to enforce regulations that restrict United States citizens from traveling to Cuba.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill to enforce the ban on travel to Cuba by U.S. citizens.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A022) Agreed to by recorded vote: 227 - 188 (Roll no. 483).
